meanings.sent1: The salad dressing was nonfatty, perfect for those watching their weight.
meanings.sent2: She chose the nonfatty yogurt for her breakfast.
meanings.sent3: The nonfatty popcorn was a hit at the party, everyone loved it!
meanings.sent4: Her nonfatty cooking style made her famous among health-conscious individuals.
meanings.sent5: The nonfatty chicken breast was so lean, it practically had no fat at all.

meanings.sent5: The nonfatty cheese had a clean taste without the greasiness of regular cheese.
